Changelog.ChangesMd:
- Added Passenger Boarding Waypoints, including custom Jetway Root Floor Heights
- Adjusted most Pushback Truck Positions and changed some Vehicle Placements
- Added Operators: Gate Gourmet and Newrest (Catering), Swissport (Handling)

Added the following Pushback Options:
- Pushback onto P2 Orange
- Straight Pushbacks on A and C Apron
- Pushback onto V2 for C01-03
- Pushback onto VC for A01-02
- Disabled Pushback Truck on Taxi-Out Stands

- added Apron E with custom Vehicle Placements and Pushback Options, including correctly configured taxi-out stands
- changed some Vehicle Placements
- renamed Deicing Areas and added missing Pads
